description: CSS file for theme management and styling of the Tic Tac Toe application frontend.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, styles the background color and text color based on the theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application that displays content centrally and adapts to light and dark themes.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, includes hover and active state styles.
